name: record-shop-fullsteak
description: frontend und backend gleichzeitig laufen lassen

scripts.update-frontend: cd record-shop-frontend && git reset --hard origin master                 && git pull
scripts.update-Backend: cd record-shop-backend  && git reset --hard origin solution/09-deployment && git pull
scripts.update-all: npm run update-backend  && npm run update-frontend
scripts.dependencies: npm install && git submodule init && git submodule update && cd record-shop-backend && git checkout solution/09-deployment && cd .. && npm run install-all && npm run seed
scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
